title: Creating Custom Colorbar Tickels in Matplotlib
description: In data visualization, colorbars are used to represent the range of values of a dataset using color. Matplotlib is a Python library for creating a variety of visualizations, including colorbars. In this lab, we will learn how to customize the tick labels on a colorbar in Matplotlib.
